text: Balakliia Raion () is the largest raion (district) in Kharkiv Oblast of Ukraine. The area of the raion is 1,986.4 km², corresponding to 6.3% of the total territory of Kharkiv Oblast. Its administrative center is the town of Balakliia. Population: == References == Category:Raions of Kharkiv Oblast
title: Balakliia Raion
